body: Ah.  I know what's happening.  I forgot to average the temperature for longer analysis periods.  Thank you for reporting and I will fix it right now.  I assure you that the comfort mannequin is not feeling radiant temperatures as hot as the surface of the sun.  Although, I guess this is saying that, if all of the sun's energy of a year hit the occupant in a single hour, they would be completely vaporized :)
